title: Distributed Data Show Episode 85: Application Development - You Asked, We Answer
description:
Jeff Carpenter and Amanda Moran discuss the big questions the DataStax Developer Advocate team hears most frequently from our developer community, and introduce a series of episodes to answer questions about application development.

Join us at DataStax Accelerate learn how Apache Cassandra and DataStax can help you succeed to building large scale applications. For tickets go to datastax.com/accelerate and use discount code ADVOCATE20. 

Highlights: 
0:00 - Open
0:30 - Recapping "Use Case Month"
1:00 - What developers are asking us about - Application Development!
2:14 - Data modeling and time series
3:33 - Picking a language and developing in Go (with Adron Hall)
4:55 - Developing in Python
6:33 - Integrating Cassandra with Kafka
7:14 - Developing in Java and best practices with Lightweight Transactions (with Eric Zietlow)
7:58 - Application development frameworks including Spring... (with David Gilardi)
9:28 - and JHipster! (with Cedrick Lunven)
10:45 - Integrating Cassandra with other technologies including graph
11:27 - Testing applications with Cassandra (with Aleks Volochnev)
12:20 - Deployment and Kubernetes
13:05 - Wrapping up


ABOUT DATASTAX ENTERPRISE 6
DataStax  powers  the  Right-Now  Enterprise  with  the  always-on,  distributed  cloud  database  built  on  Apache  Cassandraâ„¢  and designed for hybrid cloud. DataStax Enterprise 6 (DSE 6) includes industry-leading performance, self-driving operational simplicity, and robust analytics.

Learn more at http://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise and https://www.datastax.com/products/datastax-enterprise-6

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastax?sub_confirmation=1 
Site: http://datastax.com 
Facebook: https://facebook.com/datastax 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastax | https://twitter.com/datastax-academy
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/company/datastax
http://feeds.feedburner.com/datastax 
https://github.com/datastax 

ABOUT DATASTAX ACADEMY
On the DataStax Academy
